name: Elysian Imperium
startIntroPart2: From the earliest throes of Civization to the Modern Era, the Elys people have lived and died for an idea they would never see the full throes of. Will you lead this humble Tribe of Savages to it's glorious success, or watch as they fall into relative obscurity?
declaringWar: By order of the Elysian Imperium, I have come baring death. May you fight well.
The quiet has ended. Now comes the war.
attacked: A foolish move on your part.
Those who live by the sword must die by the sword.
defeated: The human spirit is never finished when it is defeated: it is finished when it surrenders.
introduction: I am a representative of the people of Elysia. Our friends shall be met with kindness; Our foes shall be met with violence.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
